popover.primary: A mastery path focused on offence and greatswords.
A mastery path focused on defence and protection.
A mastery path focused on magical attacks and effects.

data.name: Adept Movements
data.description: Improved Stance abilities now cost 35% less AP.
data.rawDescription: Improved Stance abilities now cost {COM_0_VAL1}% less AP.

data.name: Aethyric Grasp
data.description: Roots up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of you, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.
data.rawDescription: Roots up to 4 enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you, making them unable to move for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Root has a 50% chance to break whenever hit.

data.name: Balanced Accuracy
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% while you have Improved Balance, or 20% while you have Perfect Balance.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically hit by {COM_0_VAL1}% while you have Improved Balance, or {COM_1_VAL1}% while you have Perfect Balance.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Elemental resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Bladeshield
data.description: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for 600 damage and absorb up to 3600 damage for up to 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You become protected by a magical shell for a few moments which will strike back at any attacker for {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} and absorb up to {ABIL_3681_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} for up to {ABIL_3681_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Blessing of Heaven
data.description: Path of Hoeth abilities will place an effect on your target for 10 seconds. During this time, any allies who strike the target will recover 88 health over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Path of Hoeth abilities will place an effect on your target for {ABIL_3382_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time, any allies who strike the target will recover {ABIL_3381_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3381_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Blurring Shock
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: A powerful slash that deals 144 Spirit damage. For the next 10 seconds, each time the target is critically hit, they take an additional 75 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: A powerful slash that deals {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}. For the next {ABIL_3178_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, each time the target is critically hit, they take an additional {ABIL_3538_COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Bolstering Enchantments
data.description: When Blade Enchants trigger they will now restore 405 health over 10 seconds to your group members within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: When Blade Enchants trigger they will now restore {ABIL_3462_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3462_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to your group members within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Calming Winds
data.description: Increase Disrupt chance by 10% when in Improved Balance, and 20% when in Perfect balance.
data.rawDescription: Increase Disrupt chance by {COM_0_VAL0}% when in Improved Balance, and {COM_1_VAL0}% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional {ABIL_3995_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Spirit damage over {ABIL_3995_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.
data.rawDescription: You challenge all opponents in front of you, making monsters hate you more. While challenged, your opponents will deal only {COM_5_VAL0}% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after {COM_5_DURA_SECONDS} or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.
data.rawDescription:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, and neither one of you can move.
This effect cannot be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Crashing Wave
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of 262 Spirit damage and knocking your opponent down for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You launch two powerful blows dealing a total of {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE} and knocking your opponent down for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Crushing Advance
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
Requires Shield
data.description: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts 144 damage to all enemies 15 feet in front of you and interrupts any spells they are casting. Additionally, for the next 20 seconds, your block rate is increased by 5% and your armor will be increased by 618 points.
data.rawDescription: A calculated shield maneuver that inflicts {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies 15 feet in front of you and interrupts any spells they are casting. Additionally, for the next {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}, your block rate is increased by {COM_3_VAL0}% and your armor will be increased by {COM_4_VAL0} points.

data.name: Dazzling Strike
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance

data.rawDescription: When your blade hits your opponent it releases a blinding flash of light that deals {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}, and disorients your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, increasing their build times by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.rawDescription: A powerful melee attack that reduces your target's armor by {COM_1_VAL0} and deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.
data.rawDescription: Your attacks have a {COM_0_VAL1}% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Bellow

data.rawDescription: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of them, reducing their damage to {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance

data.rawDescription: You release two rending blows that deal {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} each, crippling your target for {ABIL_3535_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, reducing the damage they deal with every attack to {ABIL_3535_COM_0_VAL0}%.

Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance

data.description: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional 365 Spirit damage over 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Ensorcelled Blow will now cause an additional {ABIL_3338_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3338_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Ensorcelled Blow
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing 137 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: A quick precision slash that calls out the enchantment in your blade dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Ether Dance
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to five times and dealing 190 Spirit damage with each hit.
data.rawDescription: You focus on your target, slashing repeatedly for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, striking them up to five times and dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} with each hit.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you {COM_2_VAL1}% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Graceful Strike
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A swift attack that deals 72 damage and an additional 135 damage over 5 seconds. Monsters struck with this technique will hate you more.
data.rawDescription: A swift attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and an additional {ABIL_3831_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {ABIL_3831_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Monsters struck with this technique will hate you more.

data.name: Great Weapon Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a great weapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.
data.rawDescription: When you are wielding a great weapon, your chance to parry is increased by {COM_0_VAL0}% and all damage you deal is increased by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Gryphon's Lash
data.note: Leads to Improved Balance
data.description: A fierce attack that deals 144 damage and cannot be Blocked or Parried.
data.rawDescription: A fierce attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and cannot be Blocked or Parried.

data.name: Guard
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.
data.rawDescription:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and {COM_1_VAL1}% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Guard of Steel
data.description: Protective magic increases Toughness by 160 for 30 seconds for each group member within 100 feet.
data.rawDescription: Protective magic increases Toughness by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} for each group member within 100 feet.

data.name: Gusting Wind
data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance
Leads to Normal Balance
data.description: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals 70 Spirit damage to all opponents within 30 feet of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down monsters.
data.rawDescription: You execute a quick spin, rending the air around you and producing a magical shockwave that which deals {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to all opponents within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you, knocking back enemy players and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Heaven's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. Whenever you strike a target with a melee attack, there is a 25% chance that you will increase your group's defenses against one of the damage types that your target uses. For physical damage, your group's armor is increased by 618, and for resistance damage, that resistance is increased by 236. This effect persists for 10 seconds.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of the heavens. Whenever you strike a target with a melee attack, there is a 25% chance that you will increase your group's defenses against one of the damage types that your target uses. For physical damage, your group's armor is increased by {ABIL_3084_COM_0_VAL0}, and for resistance damage, that resistance is increased by {ABIL_3085_COM_0_VAL0}. This effect persists for {ABIL_3085_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.note: Requires Shield
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by {COM_1_VAL0}% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by {COM_0_VAL1}% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Impeccable Reactions
data.description: Each time you parry an attack, you will also parry the next attack. This double parry can not occur more than once every 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each time you parry an attack, you will also parry the next attack. This double parry can not occur more than once every {ABIL_3199_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Intimidating Blow
data.note:
Requires Improved Balance
Leads to Perfect Balance
data.description: An overpowering strike that deals 169 damage and decreases your opponent's morale by 100.
data.rawDescription: An overpowering strike that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and decreases your opponent's morale by {COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Isha's Protection
data.description: Heals are 20% more effective on you.
data.rawDescription: Heals are {COM_0_VAL1}% more effective on you.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.
data.rawDescription: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Lingering Intimidation
data.description: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to Critically hit by 25% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Intimidating Blow will now reduce your target's chance to Critically hit by {ABIL_9011_COM_3_VAL1}% for {ABIL_9011_COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.
data.rawDescription: Enemy monsters will hate you {COM_0_VAL1}% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Nature's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal 75 stat points from targets within 30 feet of you for 10 seconds. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
You enchant your blade with the spirit of nature. All your melee attacks gain a 25% chance to randomly steal {ABIL_3687_COM_0_VAL0} stat points from targets within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of you for {ABIL_3687_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. During this time, both you and groupmates within 100 feet will benefit from the stolen stats.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.description: Increase Block and Parry chances by 5% when in Improved Balance, and 10% when in Perfect balance.
data.rawDescription: Increase Block and Parry chances by {COM_0_VAL0}% when in Improved Balance, and {COM_1_VAL0}% when in Perfect balance.

data.name: Phantom's Blade
data.description:
You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to increase your group's Wounds by 162. Anyone affected will be healed for the amount increased.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.
data.rawDescription:
You enchant your blade with the spirits of the dead. All your melee attacks have a 25% chance to increase your group's Wounds by {ABIL_3231_COM_0_VAL0}. Anyone affected will be healed for the amount increased.

You may only have 1 Blade Enchantment active at a time.

data.rawDescription: You repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.
data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Sudden Shift
data.description:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
data.rawDescription:
With a graceful sweep, you quickly change your stance and prepare for battle.

No Balance: You gain Improved Balance.
Improved Balance: You gain Perfect Balance.
Perfect Balance: You gain Improved Balance.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and making monsters hate you more. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.
data.rawDescription: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and making monsters hate you more. While taunted your opponent will take {COM_3_VAL0}% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 79 damage. Has a chance to deal 679 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.
data.rawDescription: A basic throwing attack that inflicts {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}. Has a chance to deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vaul's Buffer

data.name: Wall of Darting Steel
data.note: Requires Great Weapon
data.description: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed, forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Your chances to Dodge, Disrupt and Parry attacks are increased by 50%, and whenever you defend against an attack, you will reflect back 100 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: You spin your greatsword with astounding speed, forming a wall of steel between you and your opponent. Your chances to Dodge, Disrupt and Parry attacks are increased by 50%, and whenever you defend against an attack, you will reflect back {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Wings of Heaven
data.description: You magically leap through the air towards your target.  When you land, all enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%. Cant be used if there is a too big height difference between you and your target or if you are airborne.
data.rawDescription: You magically leap through the air towards your target.  When you land, all enemies around you will become snared for 10 seconds, reducing their run speed by 60%. Cant be used if there is a too big height difference between you and your target or if you are airborne.

data.rawDescription: Dragon's Talon now additionally affects all enemies within 20 feet of your target.

data.note:
Requires Perfect Balance

data.rawDescription: An enchantment which calls upon the power of Vaul, rendering yourself and any of your groupmates within 30 feet of you immune to crowd control effects for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and reducing incoming damage by 10%.
